org.lwjgl.system.linux

Class XSetWindowAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.linux.XSetWindowAttributes

  • public final class XSetWindowAttributes
extends java.lang.Object
    Data structure for setting window attributes.
